## Get a `datelifeQuery` object

```{r}
ana_dquery <- datelife::make_datelife_query(input = "anatidae",
                                             use_tnrs = TRUE,
                                             get_spp_from_taxon = TRUE)
```
We will be working with `r length(ana_dquery$cleaned_names)` species of the famnily Anatidae.
